| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_grpissubg | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ H e. Grp ) -> ( ( S C_ B /\ ( +g ` H ) = ( ( +g ` G ) |` ( S X. S ) ) ) -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) ) |
